General.Name: Zion Oil & Gas Inc
General.Description: Zion Oil & Gas, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration company in Israel. The company holds a petroleum exploration license onshore Israel, the New Megiddo License 428 comprising an area of approximately 99,000 acres. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 12655 North Central Expressway, Dallas, TX, United States, 75243
